dmca.title: [TP-C182777U] Complaint: ilegal photo on a website
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com]

From: abuse@theplanet.com
Subject: [TP-C182777U] Complaint: ilegal photo on a website

For your review. 

Thank you, 

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc. 
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

Dear sirs 
 
I was scared to death when a friend reported to me that a website, an XXX website
with discusting content waspublishing one of my photos. 
Regardless to say, this photo is 100% unauthorized and probably was copyed from one
of my websites My picture appears here (im the one with the computer at the bottom):

http://www.putalocura.com/variedades/bochornosas/192.html
This "brazy bich"(putalocura) site runs on one of your servers:  
92.ca.5646.static.theplanet.com (70.86.202.146) 
 
I have asked the webmaster a weekago to remove my picture with no reply at all, so
im including below the new email i sent him this morning too. 
 
Is there any action it can be taken with this account/user? he is using my photo
without any authorization, in a XXX site and all that, I know you can understand the
implications. 
 
Thank you very much i will be looking forward for your answer 
 
Kindly regards 
 
_______________________________
Carlos Anibarro
Bolivia en Internet
mailto:cae@bolivia-internet.com
http://www.bolivia-internet.com 
 
----- Original Message -----
From: "Carlos Anibarro" <cae@bolivia-internet.com>
To: <webmaster@putalocura.com>
Sent: Monday, July 17, 2006 09:06
Subject: Imagen no autorizada 
 
 
> Estimados seÃ±ores
> 
> Un amigo me hizo referencia a esta pagina: 
> http://www.putalocura.com/variedades/bochornosas/192.html
> en la que aparece mi foto de manera ilegal (con el computador) Les

> 
> Atentamente
> _______________________________
> Carlos Anibarro
